subject: College Athletics
Football (College)
Basketball (College)
Colleges and Universities
Privacy
lead_paragraph: Ohio State’s new compliance measures include educating student-athletes on how to budget their money as well as monitoring athletes’ spending habits, which has raised concerns about violations of privacy.
snippet: Ohio State’s new compliance measures include educating student-athletes on how to budget their money as well as monitoring athletes’ spending habits, which has raised concerns about violations of privacy.
